title: Warriors And Suns Surge, NBA Fan Behavior
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Jamal Collier and Marc J. Spears to discuss the Warriors and Suns white hot play of late, the Bucks surging lately and what the line is for fans behavior at NBA games.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
